TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationCredentials extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationCredentials Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者認證，該使用者認證使用表單型驗證。

span.span: Configures user credentials for ASP.NET applications that use form-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一個方式來以程式設計方式存取和修改`credentials`項目`forms`一節中`authentication`組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `credentials` element of a `forms` section in the `authentication` section of the configuration file. 此類型是包含群組的一部分，則，和型別。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 集合型別中，除了所有其他會直接影響基礎的組態標記。With the exception of the collection type, all the others directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可以將資訊寫入組態檔，根據所定義的限制相關的區段。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by . 在階層中不允許的層級的組態檔中寫入的任何嘗試會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取設定資訊在階層中任何層級。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 如需安全性和延展性，建議您使用外部存放庫，例如資料庫、 維持使用者的認證。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 此範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的多個屬性的值`credentials`區段中，也可存取隸屬類別。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `credentials` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定的值`credentials`一節。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `credentials` section. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用`credentials`區段中，一定要遵照所說明的指導方針[ASP.NET 驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 如需延展性和更佳的安全性，建議您使用外部資料庫，來儲存使用者的認證。For scalability and better security, it is recommended that you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 如需有關如何建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式的詳細資訊，請搜尋 Microsoft MSDN 網站 (http://msdn.microsoft.com)為"保護 ASP.NET 應用程式 」 和 「 建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式： 驗證、 授權和安全通訊."For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (http://msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/CS/formsauthenticationcredentials.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/VB/formsauthenticationcredentials.vb#1)]
